snippet.title: Touhou 7 - Perfect Cherry Blossom - Perfect Stage 6 Lunatic
snippet.description:
A run of PCB stage 6 without dying, bombing or breaking any borders.

Seeing as perfecting final bosses is kind of impressive, I decided to upload it just for the hell of it.
The opening spam is complete and utter bullshit. Luckely, SakuyaB makes it somewhat manageble because she can shoot at both spawn points at the same time, reducing the amount of bullets.

Yuyuko's fight can actually be fully memorized. There are a lot of static patterns which you can dodge with the same actions. 
In the end, the run was dependant on not screwing up Resurrection Butterfly. 
Speaking of RB, I seem to have a different way of handling the card than most players I've seen.
I like to stand midway up the screen to anticipate the waves from there and often end up outside the lasers, which I've heard from some is completely impossible to do in their eyes.
I'm not sure which of the three manners is the best way to handle it.

A run of PCB stage 6 without dying, bombing or breaking any borders.

Seeing as perfecting final bosses is kind of impressive, I decided to upload it just for the hell of it.
The opening spam is complete and utter bullshit. Luckely, SakuyaB makes it somewhat manageble because she can shoot at both spawn points at the same time, reducing the amount of bullets.

Yuyuko's fight can actually be fully memorized. There are a lot of static patterns which you can dodge with the same actions. 
In the end, the run was dependant on not screwing up Resurrection Butterfly. 
Speaking of RB, I seem to have a different way of handling the card than most players I've seen.
I like to stand midway up the screen to anticipate the waves from there and often end up outside the lasers, which I've heard from some is completely impossible to do in their eyes.
I'm not sure which of the three manners is the best way to handle it.
